column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////If you never had deep dish pizza
column2: this is the spot to come to for authentic Chicago pizza.  The wait time can be long
column4: but it is worth it for a taste of Chicago!  During your wait time
column5: take a look at their menu and place your pizza order as soon as you can
column6: well before you think you will be seated.  The pizza takes 30 minutes to make
column7: so they will time it such that right when you get a table your pizza will be almost ready.  At this point you will be starving from waiting over an hour and looking at everyone else eating delicious pies.
